content: Yes, most of the drawing apps on the iPad Pro come with tutorials or guides to help you get started. Procreate, for example, offers a library of tutorial videos created by professional artists that cover everything from basic drawing techniques to creating specific effects. Adobe Fresco also has a guide that takes you through the basics of using the app and its features. Autodesk SketchBook offers a variety of tutorials and downloadable brush sets. Additionally, there are numerous YouTube channels that offer tutorials on using these apps, as well as general digital art techniques. Some popular channels are The Drawing Database, The Virtual Instructor, and Art with Flo. So, even if you're new to digital drawing, there are plenty of resources available to help you get started and improve your skills.
